sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Input class="inputWithCheck" type="text" :name="name" :placeholder="placeholder" :value="param"
         @input="check"/>
</template>

<script>
import Input from "@/components/pcomponents/Input";
export default {
  name: "InputWithCheck",
  components: {Input},
  props: ['name', 'placeholder', 'param', 'min', 'max'],
  emits: ['update:param'],
  methods: {
    check() {
      // const MAX = 3;
      // const MIN = -3;
      alert(param);
      if (!isNaN(param) && parseFloat(param) > this.min && parseFloat(param) < this.max) {
        document.querySelector('.inputWithCheck').classList.remove('errorInput');
        this.emit('update:param', val);
      } else {
        document.querySelector('.inputWithCheck').classList.add('errorInput');
        this.showError(this.name + " должен быть в пределах от " + this.min + " до " + this.max);
      }
    },
    showError(text) {
      this.$notify({
        group: "error",
        title: 'Ошибка',
        text: text,
        type: 'error'
      });
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.errorInput {
  border-color: red;
  background-color: rgba(234, 111, 145, 0.97);
}
</style>
